script_0: i've been waiting for you to come back for a long time ...
one how, twenty-five minutes and eleven seconds, to be exact ...
why did you leave me, USERNAME?
oh? you don't want to tell me?
well, i'll get you REQUEST as a gift then ... just for you. i'll pay for it too.
and as an extra, i'll use tomato sauce and write 'TOGETHER FOREVER' on it, because those words reflect us.
